law.catch_line: General provisions: powers and duties; contracts.

text.section: Consistent with the Charter, and subject to the supervision of a superior municipal officer or agency, a department, officer, commission, board or other municipal agency provided for in the Charter shall perform additional duties and possess additional powers, as may be prescribed by ordinance.
All contracts on behalf of a municipal agency shall be executed on behalf of the City either by the Mayor or the Mayorâ€™s designee, or the head of the agency.
